item.title: About
item.description: I am a passionate coder, and completed my Bachelors degree in Computer Science from Bharati Vidyapeeth University, Pune. I love solving real world problems. The journeys towards the solutions have been more exciting than the destinations themselves. I’ve always had a thing for Web and Mobile development, and not just their functionality but their aesthetics. For me it’s more like an art than science, always keeping up with new technologies, web frameworks and implementing their unique styles.

item.title: Bytenet VQA
item.description: About project We propose a method for visual question answering which combines a CNN with Bytenet to form a fully connected convolutional neural network. The use of Bytenet over RNN gives speed improvement over training and validation. Parallel processing of the the network results in run time that is linear in the length of the sequence. Will make it public pretty soon…

item.title: My Journey
item.description: Introduction I am a passionate coder, and completed my Bachelors degree in Computer Science from Bharati Vidyapeeth University, Pune. I love solving real world problems. The journeys towards the solutions have been more exciting than the destinations themselves. I’ve always had a thing for Web and Mobile development, and not just their functionality but their aesthetics. For me it’s more like an art than science, always keeping up with new technologies, web frameworks and implementing their unique styles.
